common.name: Name
common.managementDescription: Manage your investments with precision and clarity.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: This privacy policy describes how AlleGutta Portfolio Manager handles your personal information.
privacy.informationWeCollectDescription: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, add portfolio data, or contact us for support.
privacy.howWeUseInfoDescription: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, including portfolio tracking and analysis features.
privacy.dataSecurityDescription: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
privacy.contactUsDescription: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us.

footer.description: Personal portfolio and investment tracking application.

auth.loginRequired: You must be logged in to access this page.
auth.noPermission: You don't have permission to access this page.
auth.adminRequired: You must have administrator privileges to access this page.
auth.noPermissionManagePortfolios: You don't have permission to manage portfolios.

portfolio.managementDescription: Create and manage portfolios for the application

forms.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters

homepage.subtitle: Your personal portfolio management platform. Track your investments, manage transactions, and monitor your financial growth with precision and clarity.
homepage.featuresSubtitle: Everything you need to manage your investment portfolio effectively
homepage.portfolioTrackingDesc: Monitor your investments in real-time with detailed analytics and performance metrics.
homepage.transactionManagementDesc: Add, edit, and organize all your buy/sell transactions with detailed records.
homepage.secureAuthDesc: Your data is protected with industry-standard security and encryption.
homepage.multiPortfolioDesc: Manage multiple investment portfolios from a single dashboard.
homepage.realTimeDataDesc: Get up-to-date market prices and performance metrics when you need them.
homepage.reportingDesc: Generate comprehensive reports to track progress and performance over time.
homepage.progressiveWebAppDesc: Install as an app on any device for native-like experience and offline access.
homepage.darkModeDesc: Toggle between light and dark themes for comfortable viewing any time.
homepage.analyticsDesc: Generate detailed reports and gain insights into your investment performance.
homepage.ctaTitle: Ready to take control of your portfolio?
homepage.ctaSubtitle: Join thousands of investors who trust AlleGutta for portfolio management.
homepage.registrationDisabled: Registration is disabled. Contact an administrator for access.

about.pageDescription: A modern, secure, and user-friendly portfolio management application built with cutting-edge web technologies.
about.storyParagraph1: AlleGutta was born from the need for a simple yet powerful portfolio tracking solution. As individual investors, we found existing tools either too complex or lacking the features we needed to effectively manage our investments.
about.storyParagraph2: This application represents a complete rebuild of our original Angular-based portfolio tracker, now powered by Nuxt 4 for better performance, user experience, and modern web capabilities including Progressive Web App (PWA) support.
about.portfolioManagementDesc: Create and manage multiple portfolios with detailed tracking of holdings and performance.
about.transactionTrackingDesc: Record buy/sell orders, dividends, stock splits, and other investment activities.
about.secureAuthDesc: Enterprise-grade security powered by Kinde authentication with multi-factor support.
about.pwaDesc: Install on any device for a native app experience with offline capabilities.
about.joinUs: Join us and start managing your portfolio like a pro.

portfolioPage.noAccess: The requested portfolio doesn't exist or you don't have access to it.
portfolioPage.startByAdding: Start by adding your first transaction
